projectGridLines.title: Interactivity & Engagements
projectGridLines.description:
Own end to end data management for all the interactivities & engagements running on the platform

 

Understand the product flow and dashboard management 

 

Own the reporting of data to business team & find actionable insights

 

Work with Interactivity Publishing team on innovative ways to boost Interactivity adoption

 

Work on CMS to operationalize interactivities and related processes.
